tool_description: Just send regular information that the point is alive and receive notification if the point was not alive for a specified period of time.
name: I Am Alive
title: I Am Alive

api_list.name: Get Point
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://i-am-alive.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/points/test"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "i-am-alive.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://i-am-alive.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/points/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "i-am-alive.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
